employee.name: Diddy Kong
employee.background:
Diddy Kong is a central character in the Donkey Kong franchise, known for his agility, courage, and mischievous personality. First introduced in Donkey Kong Country (1994), Diddy Kong is Donkey Kongs loyal nephew (or close friend, depending on the source). Despite his small stature, Diddy Kong proves to be a formidable hero. He plays a key role in rescuing Donkey Kongs banana hoard from the evil King K. Rool and the Kremling army. Throughout the Donkey Kong Country series, Diddy Kongs speed, dexterity, and determination complement Donkey Kongs strength, making them an unstoppable team.
In Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy Kongs Quest, Diddy Kong takes the lead role, alongside Dixie Kong, to rescue Donkey Kong after he is captured by King K. Rool. Diddy Kongs character is often portrayed as youthful, energetic, and brave, with a desire to prove himself as a hero in his own right. He is known for his iconic red cap and shirt, which symbolize his spunky and adventurous nature.
employee.strengths: Diddy Kong is a highly versatile and agile character, often recognized for his speed, resourcefulness, and clever use of tools. His quick reflexes and nimble movements make him an excellent partner, complementing stronger characters like Donkey Kong. Diddy Kongs signature peanut popguns and banana peels showcase his creativity in battle, while his jetpack grants him impressive mobility, allowing him to reach places others cannot. Despite his smaller size, he demonstrates determination, courage, and adaptability, proving that intelligence and agility can rival brute strength.
employee.weaknesses: While Diddy Kong is fast and inventive, his weaknesses stem from his lack of raw strength and durability. Compared to larger allies like Donkey Kong, he struggles with heavy lifting and direct combat against stronger foes. His smaller size, while aiding agility, also makes him more vulnerable to powerful attacks. Additionally, his reliance on gadgets such as the jetpack or peanut popguns can leave him at a disadvantage if those tools fail or are taken away. These shortcomings highlight that Diddy Kong often depends on strategy and support rather than sheer power.

employee.name: Jar Jar Binks
employee.background: Jar Jar Binks – Min Historia Mitt namn är Jar Jar Binks. Jag kommer från Naboo, en vacker planet belägen i galaxens hjärta. Jag är Gungan – en varelse som bor i de underjordiska sjöarna och träskmarkerna, långt från de blommiga palatsen där de flesta människor på Naboo håller till. Vår kultur är rik och vår historia lång, men vi har också blivit fördömda som excentriska, klumpiga och ibland osynliga. Jag är kanske inte den bästa representanten för vårt folk, men jag har fått vara med om en hel del som få andra Gungans skulle tro var möjligt. Min resa började på allvar när jag träffade Jedi-riddaren Qui-Gon Jinn och hans unga padawan, Obi-Wan Kenobi. Jag var då, som nu, något klumpig – kanske inte den mest imponerande Gungan i galaxen, men det var mitt hjärta som styrde mina handlingar. Det var mitt mod, min vilja att hjälpa, som fick mig att stå upp för dem i en tid då det var farligt att göra det. Trots mitt yttre, mitt sätt att prata och mina mindre lyckade försök att vara storslagen, fick jag ändå vara med om något stort – ett äventyr som skulle förändra mitt liv för alltid. Jag blev deras följeslagare under deras uppdrag på Naboo, där vi kämpade mot de inkräktande droiderna som hotade planeten. Och medan mina klumpiga försök att vara hjälte kanske orsakade mer kaos än hjälp, lyckades vi till slut befria Naboo från dess fiender – och i processen hjälpte jag till att rädda mitt eget folk, Gungan-folket. Jag kanske inte var den som höll svärdet, men jag hade ändå min plats i striden. Det var där, mitt i den politiska omvälvningen, som jag började förstå min egen roll i den större kampen. Jag blev en representant för Gungan-folket i Naboo's senat. Och visst, jag var osäker. Jag visste inte riktigt om jag skulle kunna stå på den stora arenan och fatta beslut som skulle påverka hela galaxen. Men ibland var det just mitt sätt att vara – min enkelhet, mitt sätt att inte alltid förstå den politiska spelplanen – som fick folk att lyssna. Kanske inte alltid på det sätt jag hade önskat, men det var något. När Palpatine, mannen som vi alla trodde var vår räddning, började vinna mer makt, var jag där och gav honom mina röster – något som jag senare skulle ångra bittert. Det var inte förrän det var för sent som jag insåg vilken väg vi verkligen var på. Jag ville inte vara en del av Imperiet, men jag hade ändå, genom mitt misstag, gett honom den makt han behövde för att förändra galaxen för alltid. När striderna var över och nya makter tog plats, försvann jag ur rampljuset. Jag blev en skugga av min forna själv, minnena av mina tidigare handlingar förföljde mig. Många såg på mig som en simpel figur, en galen Gungan utan större betydelse. Men för mig var min resa något mer. Den var ett bevis på att även de mest oväntade kan ha en roll att spela – och att även den mest klumpiga av oss kan göra skillnad när det verkligen gäller. Så här står jag nu, som en del av denna stora berättelse om hjältar och skurkar, ljus och mörker. Kanske inte alltid på den väg jag trodde jag skulle gå, men jag har ändå fått vara med om mer än många i denna galax någonsin kommer att förstå. Och för det, är jag tacksam. – Jar Jar Binks
employee.strengths: Mod och lojalitet Jar Jar är en av de få karaktärerna som konsekvent visar mod när han ställs inför faror, även om han inte alltid är medveten om konsekvenserna av sina handlingar. Han är också extremt lojal mot sina vänner, särskilt mot Qui-Gon Jinn och Obi-Wan Kenobi, och gör allt han kan för att hjälpa dem, även om han är osäker på vad han egentligen gör. Förmåga att bygga relationer Trots sin klumpighet och talfel, har Jar Jar en naturlig förmåga att skapa vänskapsband och vinna människors (eller andras) förtroende. Hans oskuldsfulla natur gör honom till en sympatisk figur för många, och han lyckas övervinna många av sina misstag genom sin ärliga vilja att hjälpa. Snabb att tänka på fötterna Trots att han ofta råkar ställa till det, har Jar Jar ibland en oväntad förmåga att improvisera och hitta lösningar i svåra situationer. Hans handlingar – även de mest kaotiska – leder ofta till resultat, även om det inte alltid är hans intentioner. Diplomati (i vissa situationer) När han senare blir en representant i Naboo's senat, visar han att han, trots sina brister, har förmågan att engagera sig i politiska frågor och försöka förhandla mellan olika fraktioner. Även om han gör några tveksamma beslut, visar han ändå en vilja att vara en del av den större lösningen för galaxen.
employee.weaknesses: Klumpighet och naivitet En av Jar Jars mest framträdande svagheter är hans fysiska klumpighet och naivitet. Han är inte den som tänker efter före han agerar, och många av hans handlingar resulterar i kaos och oavsiktlig skada. Hans oförmåga att förutse konsekvenser gör att han ofta hamnar i problem. Låg självkänsla och osäkerhet Trots att han verkar vara en ganska glad och uppsluppen karaktär, visar Jar Jar ofta tecken på osäkerhet, särskilt när han försöker imponera på andra. Han har en tendens att underskatta sig själv och sina förmågor, vilket ibland gör att han tvekar när han måste ta viktiga beslut. Överdriven förtroende för andra Jar Jar är ibland för lätt att påverka och tenderar att lita för mycket på andra människor (eller Sith, som i fallet med Palpatine). Hans beslut att ge Palpatine de fullmakter som ledde till upprättandet av det galaktiska imperiet är ett exempel på hans bristande omdöme och oförmåga att läsa av människor. Tendens att vara en "comic relief" Jar Jar är en karaktär som i stor utsträckning används för humor i filmerna, vilket gör honom sårbar för kritik. Hans slapstick-humor och ständiga missöden skapar en uppfattning av honom som en mindre seriös eller viktig karaktär. Detta kan minska hans trovärdighet som en hjälte eller politisk aktör och ge honom en "bortglömd" status i Star Wars-världen. Förlorad politisk inblick När han ges makt i senaten, visar det sig att han saknar förmåga att förstå de långsiktiga konsekvenserna av sina handlingar. Hans beslut att stödja Palpatine är ett tydligt exempel på hur hans bristande politiska förståelse gör honom till en marionett i händerna på en mästare manipulator.

employee.name: Beast Boy
employee.background: As a young child, Garfield Logan lived with his scientist parents in Africa, who were developing "reverse evolution" to bring back extinct creatures. He received a certain amount of abuse from his parents, consequently becoming increasingly reclusive. Garfield contracted a rare illness called Sakutia, which is lethal to every species except the West African green monkey. To save his life, his father used an untested science experiment to change him into a West African green monkey for 24 hours so that the virus could die out. The serum had the unintended effect of permanently turning his skin, eyes, and hair green and granting him the ability to transform into any animal of his choice, which also shared his pigmentation.[8] His parents later died in a boating accident; to this day, Garfield believes he could have prevented their deaths.
employee.strengths: Shapeshifting: Beast Boy can transform into any animal, granting him access to a vast array of physical abilities like flight, strength, speed, and more, depending on the chosen form. Versatility: His shapeshifting allows him to adapt to various situations, making him a valuable asset in combat, reconnaissance, and support roles. Adaptability: Over time, Beast Boy has shown the ability to learn and adapt to new animal forms, even those from other planets or realms.
employee.weaknesses: Loss of Control: In some storylines, Beast Boy has struggled to maintain control over his transformations, particularly after traumatic events. Dependence on Animal Knowledge: His effectiveness relies on his knowledge of animal forms and their abilities. If he encounters an unfamiliar creature, he may be less effective. Exertion: Transforming and maintaining animal forms can be physically taxing, and excessive transformations can lead to exhaustion or even temporary loss of his powers.

employee.name: Abigail Beethoven Sciuto
employee.background: Birthplace: New Orleans, Louisiana Family: Adopted by deaf parents, which led her to learn American Sign Language (ASL) as her first language. She also has an adoptive brother, Luca Sciuto, and a biological brother, Kyle Davis Childhood: Moved frequently across the southern U.S., gaining a broad cultural understanding. Work:
employee.strengths: Analyzing forensic evidence like DNA, fingerprints, and ballistics Running toxicology reports and chemical analyses Using cutting-edge tech to solve crimes Collaborating closely with field agents, especially Gibb
employee.weaknesses: Childish, Emotional depending on others, dosen´t like changes and is overconfident.

employee.name: Nightwing
employee.background: Richard Grayson was the only child of Mary and John Grayson. When he was a child his family was part of a traveling circus as trapeze artists but his parents were murdered by a mafia boss who had a grudge against the circus owner. Richard saw his parents fall to their deaths during their circus act and was soon taken in by Bruce Wayne who had also seen the incident. After a while he found out that Bruce Wayne was Batman and began working as Batmans sidekick Robin. When Richard eventually outgrew Robin he became his own hero called Nightwing and became the leader of the superhero team Teen Titans, later renamed just Titans.
employee.strengths: Elite Acrobat: Due to his background as an acrobat Nightwing has incredible agility and is fast on his feet. Good Intellect: Due to his prior training with Batman Nightwing is a good tactician, and has very good problem solving skills and is a wonderful detective aswell as being multilingual. Extensive martial arts training: He has been trained since childhood in various fighting styles and has incredible stamina.
employee.weaknesses: He is very stubborn and extremely independent causing him to very rarely ask for help even when it is needed. He is prone to overworking himself to the point of near collapse.

employee.name: Sportacus
employee.background:
Sportacus 10 was a boy in LazyTown, named Alex. His adversary was another boy named Robbie which teased him. Sportacus 9 came along and convinced the kids to exercise and gave Alex the Sportacus 10 costume. Robbie later became Robbie Rotten and remained the adversary of Sportacus 10.
Sportacus name in English is a portmanteau of the ancient figure Spartacus and the word sport, which represents his athleticism. Sportacus humbly describes himself as a "slightly above-average hero", though his friends have a higher opinion of him, calling him a "superhero".
Sportacus encourages the children of LazyTown to eat fruits and vegetables (which he calls "sports candy") and play outside instead of sitting around indoors and eating unhealthy food. He wants to make sure LazyTown is happy, and knows that its residents have to be healthy and fit if they want to be happy. He is opposed by the sinister (yet equally energetic) Robbie Rotten, who seeks to return LazyTown to its former state: a lazy town. Sportacus is so engaged in his life of physical activity that he does parkour just to get from place to place—even doing acrobatic flips just to get from one side of his kitchen table to the other—and the children have to instruct him on how to relax.
employee.strengths: Sportacus possesses superhuman strength, agility, and stamina, along with a unique ability to enhance his powers with "sports candy" (fruits and vegetables). He is also a skilled pilot, marksman, and possesses a crystal that can detect danger. 
employee.weaknesses: Sportacus's primary weakness in LazyTown is his susceptibility to sugar. When he consumes sugary foods, especially Robbie Rotten's "sugar apple," he experiences a "sugar meltdown," rendering him weak and potentially unconscious.

employee.name: Jesse Pinkman
employee.background: Jesse's drug use led to him being estranged from his family and living a life on the streets. He became a small-time meth dealer before partnering with Walter White his former teacher to cook meth
employee.strengths: Street smarts and empathy
employee.weaknesses: Easy to manipulate

employee.name: Arthur Dent
employee.background: Arthur Dent is a polite, down-to-earth human from the planet Earth, who narrowly escaped his home planet's destruction and was unwittingly launched into the chaotic expanse of the universe. Alongside his eccentric best friend, Ford Prefect, Arthur spends several years stumbling from one crisis to another, often feeling completely out of his depth while trying to reconcile his old, simple life with the absurdities of space travel. Despite the madness around him, he clings to the small comforts that ground him, like his deep love for a good cup of tea. Over time, Arthur gradually finds a sense of fulfillment in the most unexpected of ways: as a sandwich maker, where the simple, earthly act of preparing food provides him with a surprising sense of purpose and control in a universe that often seems beyond comprehension.
employee.strengths:
Adaptability: Arthur demonstrates a surprising ability to adapt to new environments and bizarre circumstances, from alien planets to advanced technologies. Though initially overwhelmed, he manages to adjust his expectations and behavior, gradually learning how to survive in a universe far removed from his normal life on Earth. This adaptability is vital for his continued survival and progress.
Flight: Arthur Dent possesses an unusual and almost accidental ability to fly, thanks to a bizarre piece of advice from the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. The key to his flight isn't in mastering complicated techniques or controlling advanced technology, but rather in the simple concept of missing the ground. When Arthur becomes airborne, he does so not by defying gravity with any special skill, but by completely forgetting about the Earth beneath him. Essentially, by no longer focusing on the idea of falling. It's an ability that requires a sort of mental release, where he lets go of the instinct to hold on to stability.
employee.weaknesses:
Averageness: Arthur Dent's greatest weakness might be his overwhelming averageness. He is, in nearly every sense, a quintessential "everyman," with no extraordinary skills, talents, or characteristics to set him apart from anyone else. This lack of distinction often leaves him at a disadvantage in the extraordinary universe he's thrown into. While his ordinary nature allows him to blend in, it also makes him ill-equipped to handle the bizarre challenges he faces. In moments where quick thinking, sharp wit, or specialized knowledge are crucial, Arthur's tendency to rely on basic common sense can hold him back, forcing him to be reactive rather than proactive.
Indecisiveness: Another notable weakness in Arthur's abilities is his indecisiveness. He tends to overanalyze and hesitate before taking action, which can hinder his effectiveness in urgent moments. This hesitation sometimes results in missed opportunities or increased danger, as he is slow to commit to a course of acton

employee.name: Mickey Mouse
employee.background: Mickey Mouse was created by Walt Disney and Ub Iwerks, making his debut on November 18, 1928 in the animated short Steamboat Willie. He quickly became the face of The Walt Disney Company and one of the most iconic cartoon characters in the world.
employee.strengths: Mickey Mouse is brave, optimistic, and clever. He faces challenges head-on and never lets fear stop him from doing what's right. With his quick thinking and creativity, he always finds a way to solve problems, no matter how difficult they seem. Mickey's positive attitude helps him stay hopeful even in tough situations. He is also very caring and compassionate, always ready to support and help his friends whenever they need him. His kindness and loyalty make him a true friend and a beloved character around the world.
employee.weaknesses: Mickey can be stubborn at times, holding firmly to his ideas even when it might be better to listen to others. Sometimes he acts before fully thinking things through, which can lead to unexpected problems. His trusting nature and occasional naivety mean he doesn't always see when someone might be trying to take advantage of him. Because of this, Mickey sometimes finds himself in tricky or challenging situations.

employee.name: Don Lorenzo
employee.background:
Don Lorenzo was born in the slums of Italy, where life was dominated by poverty and survival. Growing up in such harsh conditions gave him a single-minded obsession with money—to him, wealth is the ultimate goal, more important than fame, honor, or even the sport itself. This obsession explains his eccentric appearance: he flaunts his gold teeth, sports flashy tattoos, and presents himself like someone who wants to display the wealth he never had as a child.
Because of his environment, Lorenzo developed an unconventional approach to football. Instead of learning the game through structured coaching, he built his style on raw instinct and natural athleticism. His lanky body, long limbs, and uncoordinated movements became the foundation of his signature technique, Zombie Dribbling, which makes him extremely difficult to predict. His upbringing in chaos directly shaped his chaotic playstyle—loose, flowing, and impossible to read.
Despite his carefree and eccentric personality, Lorenzo’s raw talent pushed him to the top. He was scouted into professional football, eventually becoming the libero of Italy’s Ubers and earning a place in the Italy U-20 national team. His defensive brilliance and ability to lock down even the strongest strikers earned him the nickname “The Ace Eater.” While other players in Blue Lock are driven by ego or dreams of becoming the world’s best striker, Lorenzo is unique in that his drive is purely material—football is his tool for wealth, nothing more.
employee.strengths: Don Lorenzo, known as The Ace Eater in Blue Lock, is considered one of the strongest defenders in the entire series. Playing as a libero for the Italy Ubers and the U-20 national team, his greatest strength lies in his ability to completely shut down the opposing team’s ace striker. He combines elite defensive instincts with incredible spatial awareness, positional control, and man-marking skills, which allow him to intercept passes, block shots, and dictate the flow of the game. His signature technique, Zombie Dribbling, makes him even more unpredictable—his awkward, uncoordinated movements between his upper and lower body throw off opponents trying to anticipate his direction, giving him an edge both in defense and while carrying the ball forward. His lanky physique, with long arms and legs, enhances his reach and makes him extremely difficult to bypass. Unlike players who rely on complex calculations, Lorenzo thrives on instinct, flowing with the rhythm of the match and reacting with almost animal-like reflexes. This natural style allows him to maintain control under pressure and spearhead counterattacks with ease. Fans often regard him as the pinnacle of defensive play in Blue Lock, with many highlighting how he kept world-class forwards like Michael Kaiser almost completely locked down. Taken together, Lorenzo’s mix of physical dominance, unique dribbling style, and instinctive tactical brilliance make him arguably the strongest defender in the story, a nightmare for any striker, and an indispensable weapon for his team.
employee.weaknesses: Don Lorenzo may be a defensive monster, but he’s not without weaknesses. His biggest flaw is his overreliance on instinct—while his natural feel for the game makes him unpredictable, it also means he doesn’t analyze or calculate situations as deeply as players like Isagi or Kaiser. Against strikers with sharp tactical awareness, his instinct-driven style can sometimes be outmaneuvered if they manage to read his reactions. Another weakness is that his offensive contribution is limited compared to his defensive dominance; he can dribble unpredictably with Zombie Dribbling, but he isn’t a natural playmaker or finisher, which makes him less threatening in front of goal. In addition, while his height and long limbs are a big advantage in interceptions, they also make his movements a bit slower and less explosive than shorter, more agile players—meaning he can struggle against ultra-fast dribblers who thrive in tight spaces. Finally, his eccentric personality and obsession with money can distract from his focus at times, suggesting that his mental game may not be as ironclad as his physical one.

employee.name: Leon Kennedy
employee.background: Leon S. Kennedy is a former Raccoon City police officer turned elite government agent. He began his career with the R.P.D. (Raccoon City Police Department), where he was caught in the midst of the infamous 1998 outbreak caused by the Umbrella Corporation. His survival and actions during the incident led to recruitment into a U.S. government agency tasked with bio-terrorism containment. Over two decades, Leon has become a highly skilled agent with extensive experience in counter-bioterrorism, hostage rescue, and high-risk diplomatic missions.
employee.strengths: Leon possesses an extraordinary ability to remain composed and strategic under pressure, making him one of the most effective agents in high-stakes, unpredictable environments. His combat skills—ranging from firearms proficiency to hand-to-hand techniques—are the product of years of frontline exposure and tactical training. He's also highly adaptive, capable of using his surroundings to his advantage in ways that surpass standard protocol. Leon is multilingual and maintains strong investigative instincts, often identifying threats before they escalate. His sense of duty is unwavering, and he consistently places the mission and the safety of others above personal risk.
employee.weaknesses: Despite his strengths, Leon is not without vulnerabilities. Years of exposure to biological horrors and covert warfare have left psychological scars that manifest as insomnia, emotional detachment, and signs of chronic stress. He has a tendency to shoulder responsibilities alone, often refusing assistance even when collaboration would be more efficient. Leon also exhibits signs of cynicism and mistrust, particularly toward corporations and authority figures—an understandable but potentially limiting mindset in cooperative operations. His drive to complete missions at any cost can sometimes border on recklessness, especially when innocent lives are at stake.

employee.name: Harrier Du Bois
employee.background:
Officer Harrier Du Bois is a veteran investigator whose career reflects both a high degree of professional aptitude and a history of personal instability. He demonstrates strong intuitive and deductive reasoning skills, often arriving at unconventional conclusions through non-linear methods. His approach to problem-solving can be erratic, but has, at times, yielded effective and unexpected results.
Du Bois's psychological profile indicates a complex personality structure. He exhibits signs of chronic stress, identity fragmentation, and substance dependency, all of which have impacted his operational reliability. Notably, he has experienced episodes of dissociation and memory loss, though he retains a remarkable capacity for critical insight and abstract reasoning when focused.
Despite ongoing behavioral concerns, Officer Du Bois has shown periods of self-correction and a capacity for empathetic engagement with the public. His performance varies widely, dependent on psychological state and environmental stability.
employee.strengths:
1. Exceptional deductive reasoning and abstract thinking.
2. Highly nuanced understanding of Human Behavior:
3. Persistent Determination, even under Pressure:
4. Lateral Thinking and Creativity:
5. Multidisciplinary Knowledge:
6. Empathy
employee.weaknesses:
1. Psychological Instability
2. Substance Dependency
3. Incosistent adherence to professional Conduct and Discipline
4. Physical Fragility
5. Disorganization and Procedural Lapses
6. Identity Dissociation and Memory Loss

employee.name: Yeon Si-eun
employee.background: Raised as a quiet and withdrawn student, he learned early on to rely more on his sharp intellect than physical strength, making him used to analyzing people and situations to always stay one step ahead. He has often stood alone and avoided deeper relationships, but this has at the same time given him a strong independence and a relentless will to cope regardless of obstacles.
employee.strengths: Sharp analytical skills and calm under pressure. Knows what to do to win a fight, even when the opponent is stronger or outnumbered, as he uses his intellect and ability to anticipate the next move rather than brute strength. He is reserved and often lonely, but behind his quiet surface hides a sense of purpose and a will to never give up, no matter how difficult the circumstances. His background as a withdrawn student means he doesn't trust others easily, but that independence has shaped him into a person who can always stand on his own two feet.
employee.weaknesses: Physically weaker than many of their opponents and easily injured, has difficulty trusting others and often isolates themselves which makes cooperation more difficult, also carries a strong self-criticism that can become a mental burden in pressured situations.

employee.name: Oliver Queen
employee.background:
Oliver was the son of the late Robert Queen and Moira Queen, the older paternal half-brother of Emiko Adachi, the older maternal half-brother of Thea Queen, the husband of Felicity Smoak, and the father of William Clayton and Mia Queen. He was also the ex-boyfriend/good friend of the late Laurel Lance, Sara Lance, and Shado. He was also the ex-lover of Samantha Clayton. He was also the ex-boyfriend turned enemy of Helena Bertinelli. He was also the best friend of Tommy Merlyn, John Diggle and Barry Allen, and a good friend of Quentin Lance, Roy Harper, Lyla Michaels, Anatoly Knyazev, Ray Palmer, Kara Danvers, Rene Ramirez, Dinah Drake, and Curtis Holt.
Oliver was lost from society after his family's yacht sank and made it to the island of Lian Yu, where he went on a mission of survival and self-discovery, learning skills that include, and aren't limited to, archery, swordsmanship, hand-hand combat, etc. He traveled to China and Russia on missions as an agent of A.R.G.U.S. for some time, became a member of the Solntsevskaya Bratva known as Kapot (Russian for Car Hood), and the murderous vigilante Luchnik/Kapiushon (Russian for Archer/Hood). After being presumed dead and lost at sea for five years, Oliver returned home with a mission to save his city from crime and corruption. He began his crusade as an archer who would eventually become known as the Hood, Starling City Vigilante[4][5][6], or simply the Vigilante. As the Hood, Oliver was willing to use lethal force by targeting members on his father's list.
After the Undertaking caused the death of his best friend, Tommy, Oliver decided to continue his crusade, renamed as the Arrow, stylized as the "Emerald Archer",[7] while also making a vow to avoid killing whenever possible to honor Tommy's memory. As the Arrow, Oliver continued working with Diggle and Felicity, met forensic scientist Barry from Central City, and had confrontations with Slade who he met on the island and had presumed dead. Five months after saving Starling City from the Siege, the Arrow was declared as a hero to the citizens of Starling City.
Following the initial death of Laurel's sister and his ex-girlfriend, Sara, Oliver came into conflict with Ra's al Ghul, the leader of the League of Assassins who threatened to kill the people of Starling City if he did not not find Sara's killer, forcing Oliver to falsely claim responsibility in order to fight Ra's to the death, where Oliver was vastly outmatched and defeated and almost killed. Oliver survived the duel and by law had to become the next Ra's al Ghul, but he refused, resulting in Roy taking the fall after Ra's outed Oliver's identity to the public. When Ra's nearly killed Thea, Oliver gave in to the League in order to save his half-sister's life and joined them under the identity of Al Sah-him (Arabic: السهم; for Arrow). When Ra's planned to have Oliver destroy his home, Starling City, a tradition all becoming the next Ra's al Ghul must commit, an event which would be known as the Outbreak. Oliver, who was seemingly erased from his old life, returned to his team to stop the attack and Ra's al Ghul once and for all. After saving Starling City, Oliver retired from vigilantism and began a new life in Ivy Town with Felicity.
Five months after retiring, Oliver was called back to Starling City, renamed Star City in honor of the seemingly-dead Ray Palmer, and took up a new code-name, Green Arrow, to continue fighting for the people of his city. After stopping the terrorist organization H.I.V.E., and its leader Damien Darhk, from completing Genesis, his rallying of Star City as Oliver Queen earned him the full support of the people and soon after was made the mayor.
Five months after becoming mayor, he came into conflict with Adrian Chase, aka Prometheus, a serial killer wanting to avenge his father, Justin Claybourne and destroy Oliver's life. When Chase's team captured Oliver's friends and family, their final confrontation was met on Lian Yu. While Oliver freed everyone, including his illegitimate son, William Clayton, Chase killed himself to detonate bombs placed all over Lian Yu in an attempt to kill everyone on it.
After the events on Lian Yu, Oliver decided to raise William, as a promise he made to the latter's mother; Samantha Clayton, who died on the island. While Oliver struggled with his secret identity as the vigilante being compromised by the F.B.I., he also had to deal with Cayden James who planned to destroy Star City after believing Oliver killed his son, Owen Post. After defeating James, it gave rise to his true manipulator Ricardo Diaz, who subsequently began to take control of Star City's government by using all of James' assets and amass a huge army.
In a desperate effort to take down Diaz and liberate Star City from his control, Oliver turns to the FBI for their help in exchange for turning himself in for his crimes as a vigilante. Although they failed to capture Diaz, the city was taken back and Oliver publicly confessed he was Green Arrow before being sent to Slabside Maximum Security Prison, being identified as Inmate 4587.
Oliver was released six months after Diaz was captured, and faced with the emergence of his half-sister, Emiko Adachi, who was using the Green Arrow's name and motives. He decided to separate himself from the impersonator and continue serving the city by officially using his skills as a deputized black-ops member of the SCPD. After ending the conflict with Emiko and the Ninth Circle, Oliver briefly went into hiding with Felicity, who was pregnant. After Mia's birth, he received a follow-up visit from Mar Novu, reminding him of the promise he made to save the multiverse.
Oliver was killed by an army of shadow demons, stalling for time to save billions of people on Earth-38,[2] but he was resurrected by John Constantine in a Lazarus Pit on Earth-18. Mia went to try and save him, but Jim Corrigan convinced her that Oliver was needed in Purgatory and as a result, his soul chose to remain there and go with Corrigan while his body was vaporized by antimatter.[8] About a month later, Oliver returned to the living world as the new Spectre, but he sacrificed his life again to create Earth-Prime, as well as the new multiverse.[3] Oliver was also able to change events to save Moira, Tommy, Quentin, and Emiko, as well as restore Sara Diggle's existence.
As the Spectre, Oliver would spend the rest of eternity in Purgatory watching over the multiverse. He also kept an eye on his friends and family, specifically his children William and Mia, and witnessed John Diggle with a "cube" designed to tempt him. In 2023 when Ramsey Rosso attempted to spread his infection across the multiverse and had Wally West kill Barry Allen, Oliver briefly returned as the Green Arrow to help Barry stop him. With their destiny written, Felicity would reunite with Oliver in the afterlife in 2040.
employee.strengths: Peak Human Condition: He is in peak physical condition, comparable to a world-class athlete, with enhanced strength, speed, and stamina. Master Martial Artist: Oliver is a highly skilled martial artist, trained in various fighting styles. Strength Feats: He can pull back and fire arrows with astonishing force, and has shown the ability to knock out opponents with punches and kicks. He can also lift twice his body weight, which is within the range of peak humans, according to Quora. Enhanced Agility: He is extremely agile and quick on his feet, enabling him to evade attacks and quickly maneuver for optimal shots. Combat Skills and Abilities: Master Archer: Oliver's primary weapon is his bow and arrow, and he is a highly skilled archer with pinpoint accuracy. Swordsmanship: He is also proficient in swordsmanship, having trained with the League of Assassins. Tactical Genius: Oliver is a brilliant strategist and tactician, able to analyze situations and devise effective plans. Leadership: He is a natural leader, inspiring loyalty and trust in his team. Other Notable Strengths: Resilience: Oliver has demonstrated remarkable resilience, enduring torture, trauma, and physical injuries. Willpower: He possesses a strong will and determination, allowing him to overcome adversity and achieve his goals. Multilingualism: He is fluent in multiple languages, including Russian and Mandarin. Detective Skills: Oliver is an excellent detective, able to gather information and solve mysteries.
employee.weaknesses: Physical Vulnerability: As a normal human, Oliver is susceptible to physical harm from stronger opponents. While he is a skilled archer and martial artist, he often relies on ranged attacks to compensate for his physical limitations. Emotional and Psychological Weaknesses: Trauma and Mental Health: Oliver's experiences on Lian Yu, particularly the loss of loved ones, have left him with emotional scars and a tendency towards depression and self-destructive behavior. Difficulty Forming Trusting Relationships: Oliver's past betrayals and experiences with loss make it challenging for him to fully trust others, even those closest to him. Recklessness and Impulsivity: Oliver's past actions and choices, particularly when dealing with threats, often showcase a degree of recklessness and a willingness to take extreme measures. Moral Ambiguity: While he strives to be a hero, Oliver's past actions, including brutal methods and torture, demonstrate a darker side and a tendency towards moral ambiguity. Alcoholism: Oliver struggled with alcoholism as a coping mechanism for dealing with trauma and grief. Paranoia: Oliver's past experiences have also led to paranoia and a tendency to isolate himself when facing perceived threats.

employee.name: Mr Sock
employee.background:
Namn: Spock Födelse ort: Planeten Vulkan Ras: Halvvulkanier (hälften vulkan, hälften människa) Föräldrar:
Far: Sarek (vulkanier, ambassadör) Mor: Amanda Grayson (människa, lärare)
Yrke: Spock tjänstgör som vetenskapsofficer och förstaofficer ombord på rymdskeppet USS Enterprise. Han är känd för sin skarpa logik och känslomässiga självkontroll, typiska drag för vulkanier.
Personlighet och egenskaper:
Har en stark tilltro till logik och rationellt tänkande. Kämpar ofta med sin mänskliga sida, vilket ger en komplex inre konflikt mellan känsla och förnuft. Har en karakteristisk hälsning och fras: "Live long and prosper" ("Lev länge och blomstra"). Har övermänskliga styrkor och förmågor tack vare sin vulkaniska härkomst, som till exempel extremt kontroll över kroppen och känslorna.
employee.strengths:
Logik och Intellekt Spocks största styrka är hans förmåga att tänka logiskt och rationellt, vilket gör honom till en exceptionell vetenskapsofficer. Han löser problem snabbt och effektivt, ofta under press, genom att eliminera känslomässiga faktorer och fokusera på ren logik. Hans intellekt sträcker sig över många discipliner, inklusive fysik, matematik, filosofi och medicin.
Fysiska förmågor Som en vulkanier är Spock starkare och mer uthållig än människor. Hans kropp kan också tolerera större påfrestningar, som höga temperaturer och extremt fysiskt arbete, vilket gör honom till en kraftfull allierad i strid eller nödsituationer. Han har även förmågan att kontrollera sina egna biologiska funktioner, som att sakta ner sin hjärtfrekvens.
Mental disciplinerad kontroll Vulkaner tränar sin mentala kontroll, vilket gör att Spock har en extrem förmåga att blockera känslor och agera objektivt. Han har också en exceptionell förmåga att hantera stress och svåra situationer, ofta med ett lugn som hjälper hans besättningsmedlemmar att tänka klart under tryck.
Telepatiska förmågor (delvis) Eftersom Spock är delvis vulkan, har han viss telepatisk förmåga, särskilt med andra vulkanier. Han kan känna av andras känslor eller till och med läsa tankar i vissa situationer. Detta ger honom ett extra lager av förståelse när han interagerar med andra, även om han inte använder denna förmåga lika ofta som andra karaktärer i Star Trek.
Starka ledarskapsförmågor Spock är en naturlig ledare när situationen kräver det, även om hans ledarskap ofta är baserat på logik och analys snarare än känslomässigt engagemang. Hans förmåga att hålla sig rationell och objektiv gör honom till en pålitlig och respektabel ledare i krissituationer.
Vulkanisk filosofi och etik Vulkanernas filosofi, som Spock följer, betonar självkontroll, lojalitet, och ett starkt moralisk kompass. Detta gör honom inte bara en skicklig officer, utan också en person av hög moral och etik, vilket gör att han fattar beslut som gynnar större välmående och rättvisa.
employee.weaknesses:
Känslomässig konflikt Spock är halvvulkan och halvmänniska, vilket leder till en ständig inre kamp mellan hans logiska vulkaniska sida och hans känslomässiga mänskliga sida. Denna konflikt kan ibland göra honom osäker eller skapa psykologisk stress.
Sociala svårigheter Hans starka fokus på logik och rationellt tänkande gör att han ibland har svårt att förstå eller uttrycka mänskliga känslor och sociala nyanser, vilket kan leda till missförstånd med andra.
Vulkanernas kontroll över känslor Vulkaner undertrycker sina känslor strikt. Även om detta är en styrka, kan det också vara en svaghet när han inte tillåter sig att bearbeta känslor på ett hälsosamt sätt, vilket kan påverka hans beslutsfattande i känsloladdade situationer.
Fysisk sårbarhet i vissa situationer Trots att han har övermänsklig styrka och uthållighet tack vare sin vulkaniska härkomst, kan han ändå skadas eller påverkas av avancerad teknik, psykiska attacker eller fysiska hot som utnyttjar hans mänskliga sårbarheter.
Känslighet för psykisk påverkan Spock är ibland sårbar för telepatiska eller mentala attacker, särskilt från andra vulkaner eller varelser med psykiska förmågor, eftersom hans sinnen är extra utvecklade.

employee.name: Sergei Dragunov
employee.background: Dragunov is a member of an elite special operations unit in the Russian military. This role has put him in conflict with parties including the United Nations officers Raven and Master Raven, and earned him the moniker "The White Angel of Death".
employee.strengths: Dragunov fights using Commando Sambo; a modified offensive style of Sambo used and trained by members of the Russian army to defend one's self in a hand-to-hand combat situation. Sambo as a sport focuses on throwing and submissions whilst restricting chokeholds. Commando Sambo differs from the sport variation as users are given the privilege of punching, kicking and the intention of fracturing bones. The punching and kicking motions are derived from Mixed Martial Arts techniques.
employee.weaknesses: His reliance on certain moves like D+2 can be exploited, and his approaches, particularly WR+2, are linear and vulnerable to sidestepping. He also lacks strong keepout tools and may struggle with his defensive options due to his strong offensive capabilities.

employee.name: Dante
employee.background: Ursprung och familjDante är halvdemon, halv-människa.Hans far är Sparda, en legendarisk demonriddare som förrådde sin egen ras för att skydda mänskligheten.Hans mor är Eva, en människa.Dante har en tvillingbror, Vergil, som spelar en central roll i flera spel som både rival och spegelbild till Dante.Barndom och tragediNär Dante och Vergil var barn attackerades familjen av demoner som ville hämnas på Sparda.Eva dödades i anfallet, och bröderna separerades.Dante växte upp med hat mot demoner och en vilja att använda sina krafter för att skydda människor.PersonlighetDante är känd för sin coola, kaxiga och humoristiska attityd.Han skämtar ofta mitt i strider, men under ytan finns sorg över hans familjs öde.Till skillnad från Vergil, som söker makt, väljer Dante att använda sina krafter för att kämpa för mänskligheten.YrkeDante grundar Devil May Cry, en demonjägarbyrå.Han tar uppdrag som rör övernaturliga hot, men ofta blir han indragen i större konflikter som gäller demonvärlden och mänsklighetens överlevnad.KrafternaDante har ärvt demoniska krafter från Sparda:Övermänsklig styrka, snabbhet och uthållighet.Förmågan att använda "Devil Trigger" – förvandling till ett kraftfullare demoniskt tillstånd.Han är också en mästare på både svärd och skjutvapen, där hans ikoniska vapen är:Rebellion (svärd)Ebony & Ivory (två pistoler)
employee.strengths: 💪 Fysiska och demoniska förmågorÖvermänsklig styrka – kan enkelt lyfta och kasta enorma vapen och fiender.Extrem snabbhet & reflexer – rör sig snabbare än ögat kan uppfatta, kan undvika kulor och attackera i blixtsnabba kombinationer.Nästan odödlig uthållighet – hans demoniska blod gör att han tål skador som skulle döda en människa (t.ex. spetsas, skjutas, kastas från höga höjder).Snabb läkning – kan återhämta sig från skador på kort tid.👹 Devil TriggerHans signaturförmåga: Dante kan förvandla sig till ett demoniskt tillstånd som ökar styrka, hastighet och försvar dramatiskt.Ger honom även självläkning och tillgång till unika demoniska attacker.I Sin Devil Trigger (DMC5) blir han nästan gudalik i kraft.⚔️ VapenkunskaperMästare på svärd – särskilt med sitt ikoniska svärd Rebellion och senare Devil Sword Dante.Expert på skjutvapen – använder pistolerna Ebony & Ivory för stilfulla, akrobatiska strider.Unika demonvapen – Dante kan använda fienders själar för att skapa nya vapen (som Cerberus, Ifrit, Balrog).🧠 Personlighet och stilOrädd & självsäker – även mot gudar och demonherrar behåller han sitt lugn och humor.Stridserfarenhet – har mött och besegrat otaliga mäktiga demoner och bossar.Anpassningsförmåga – kan kombinera olika stilar (Swordmaster, Gunslinger, Trickster, Royal Guard m.fl.) för att passa olika situationer.🌌 Andliga styrkorSpardas arv – som son till Sparda har Dante krafter som överträffar de flesta demoner.Viljestyrka – trots tragedin i sin barndom har han valt att kämpa för människor istället för att bli förslavad av maktbegär som sin bror Vergil.
employee.weaknesses: ⚔️ Fysiska svagheterInte helt odödlig – trots sin regenerering kan han bli allvarligt skadad om han tar för mycket stryk på kort tid.Kräver Devil Trigger för full kraft – i mänsklig form är han fortfarande stark, men inte på samma nivå som i demonform.Energi-begränsning – Devil Trigger har en tidsgräns och kräver energi, vilket gör honom sårbar när den tar slut.🧠 Psykologiska svagheterÖvermod & kaxighet – hans självsäkra attityd gör ibland att han underskattar sina motståndare.Familjeband – särskilt relationen med Vergil; hans bror är både hans största rival och svaghet. Dante tvekar ofta i strid mot honom.Traumat från barndomen – förlusten av sin mor och separationen från Vergil påverkar honom fortfarande känslomässigt.🌌 Moraliska svagheterMänsklig empati – till skillnad från många demoner tvekar Dante att skada oskyldiga, vilket ibland kan utnyttjas av fiender.Skyddar andra framför sig själv – han riskerar ofta sitt liv för att rädda andra, vilket gör honom sårbar i bakhåll.⚖️ Jämförelse med VergilDante har hjärta men ibland för lite fokus.Vergil har fokus och beslutsamhet, men saknar empati.👉 Detta gör Dante mer mänsklig men också mer sårbar känslomässigt.

employee.name: Stål Kalle
employee.background:
Kalle Anka ärver ett gammalt hus av en mystisk släkting, Fantomias. Där hittar han gömda redskap, vapen och en hemlig dräkt. Han ikläder sig den nya identiteten och börjar sin karriär som en slags hämnare.
Stål Kalle började som en anti-hero som använde sin hemliga identitet för att hämnas på dome som tyckte illa om hans riktiga person. Men med tiden utvecklas han och blir en riktig superhjälte som kämpar för rättvisa.
employee.strengths:
Han har kontakter som kan fixa ny utrustning och hjälpa till i hans superhjälte arbete. Oppfinnar-Jocke bygger många av Stål Kalles vapen och fordon.
Stål Kalle är, trots sin riktiga person, modig och hjälteinriktad. Han är också listig och förvånansvärt smart.
employee.weaknesses: Stål Kalle är fortfarande en vanlig med borgare och har inga övernaturliga krafter, vilket kan göra honom väldigt sårbar utan sina prylar.

employee.name: Tecna
employee.background: Tecna is the Fairy of Technology and a founding member of the Winx Club. She hails from the planet Zenith, a highly advanced world driven by logic and technology. Tecna is known for her intelligence, analytical mind, and calm demeanor. She attends Alfea College for Fairies, where she hones her magical abilities alongside her friends.
employee.strengths: Highly Intelligent: Tecna is a tech genius, often creating gadgets or solving complex problems using logic. Strategic Thinker: She is the group's problem-solver and often takes a rational approach to challenges. Technomagic Powers: She can control and manipulate digital and electronic systems. Loyal Friend: Though logical, she deeply cares for her friends and supports them when it matters most. Calm Under Pressure: Rarely panics and often provides stability in high-stress situations.
employee.weaknesses: Emotionally Reserved: She struggles to express her feelings, which can make her seem distant. Overly Logical: Sometimes relies too much on logic and has difficulty understanding emotional or irrational behavior. Social Challenges: Her tech-savvy and rational nature can isolate her in emotional conversations or group dynamics. Risk of Isolation: Because she values independence and efficiency, she may push others away unintentionally.

employee.name: Darth Revan
employee.background: Initially a respected Jedi, he defied the Jedi Council by leading a faction of Jedi Knights into the Mandalorian Wars, becoming a celebrated war hero. Driven by a desire to defeat the Mandalorians, he delved into the Unknown Regions and discovered an ancient Sith Empire, ultimately falling to the dark side and becoming Darth Revan.
employee.strengths: exceptional mastery of both the light and dark sides of the Force, his strategic brilliance, and his formidable lightsaber combat skills
employee.weaknesses: Darth Revan's primary weakness was his overconfidence and arrogance.

employee.name: Gandalf
employee.background: Gandalf is one of the Istari (Wizards) sent by the Valar to Middle-earth to guide its peoples against Sauron. Known by many names (Mithrandir, Olórin, Grey Pilgrim). Wandered across Middle-earth, gathering knowledge, offering counsel, and uniting Free Peoples. Played a decisive role in the downfall of Sauron during the War of the Ring.
employee.strengths: Great wisdom and knowledge. Skilled in magic, persuasion, and leadership. Inspires hope and courage in others. Strategic thinker and long-term planner. Strong moral compass and resilience.
employee.weaknesses: Cannot directly dominate others (bound by the rules of the Istari). Sometimes secretive or cryptic in communication. Limited patience with foolishness (quick temper at times). Physically vulnerable compared to other beings (not invincible).

employee.name: Neo
employee.background: In his normal life, he is a quiet programmer for the "respectable software company" Meta Cortex, while in private, he is a computer hacker who penetrates computer systems illicitly and steals information under his hacker alias "Neo". He also sells illegal untraceable computer systems and hacking programs along with controlling computer viruses stashed on CDs and diskettes. During his time as a hacker, Anderson has learned about something known only as "The Matrix".
employee.strengths: Super Speed (Bullet Time) Superhuman Strength Flight Near-Invulnerability Matrix Vision Telekinesis Phasing Precognition & Awareness
employee.weaknesses: Neo's flaw is that he won't accept that he is The One. In terms of wants and needs, he wants to believe that he's not special (and the Oracle reinforces this when she tells him he isn't). But he needs to believe, because until he does he doesn't stand a chance against Agent Smith. So his wants and needs conflict.

employee.name: Feathers McGraw
employee.background: Feathers McGraw is a slick, silent penguin who doesn’t say a word, but his actions speak for him. He first showed up in The Wrong Trousers, where he quickly became a notorious villain. Feathers isn’t just any penguin; he’s a smooth operator with a knack for stealing and getting away with it, all while staying out of sight. He’s got a sharp mind, and he’s always one step ahead of the people trying to stop him.
employee.strengths: Stealth: Feathers is great at sneaking around unnoticed. He can blend in, use disguises, and stay hidden until it’s time to strike. Brains: He’s smart, always thinking of clever ways to pull off a crime or get out of a tight spot. He doesn’t rely on force, just his wits. Silent but Deadly: Even though he never speaks, Feathers is great at communicating through his actions and expressions. He makes people nervous without saying a word. Quick on His Feet: Whether it’s stealing something or escaping, he’s adaptable and able to come up with a plan on the fly. Feathers McGraw is the kind of villain who doesn’t need to shout to be feared. He’s quiet, clever, and always in control.
employee.weaknesses: Feathers McGraw has a few weaknesses that even his cleverness can’t hide. He’s often overconfident, believing he’s always the smartest one in the room, which can lead to careless mistakes. His focus on winning can make him miss important details. He also tends to underestimate Gromit, not realizing how sharp the dog actually is. While Feathers is a mastermind, he’s not physically strong, so if he gets caught off guard, he can struggle to break free. Finally, his impatience can get the best of him. When things don’t go as planned, he tends to act too quickly, making decisions that end up backfiring.

employee.name: The Void
employee.background: Though the exact origin of the Void is unknown, his first activities were seemingly traced all the way back to circa 1600 BCE, when Moses pleaded for every Hebrew doorpost to be marked with lamb's blood in order to protect the Jewish firstborn from the final plague God was going to bring on Pharaoh Ramses and on Egypt: the Angel of Death, believed to be the Void himself (though other beings have been told to be that entity).
employee.strengths:
Matter Manipulation: The Void possesses similar matter and energy manipulation abilities as the Sentry. Having used it to entrap the Avengers within an inescapable shroud of black matter he had conjured up, material easily able to hold the likes of Thor and Giant-Man with ease. At its most focused i.e. through his tendrils, the Void can cause total atomic cancellation within a target, as he did when he disintegrated the immortal Loki.
Regeneration: The Void can heal himself from virtually all injuries.
Resurrection: The Void appears to be able to resurrect himself and to bring the dead back to life under extreme emotional distress.
employee.weaknesses:
Magic: The Void can be sealed with powerful magic, as was done by Doctor Strange.
Chi: The Void was proven to be vulnerable to spiritual energy attacks like Chi.
Domination of darkness: The Void being technically a dark entity, any deity with control over other beings of darkness can bend his will.
